title: How will I write a letter to my class teacher requesting for five days leave? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Class Teacher, Class X, Bishop Morrow School, Krishnagar, Nadia-741101. 5 March, 2018. Sir/Ma'am, The undersigned is a student of your class, Roll Number:10. I beg to state that I have been suffering from tonsillitis since Saturday. The doctor has advised me to take adequate rest and medication for at least 3 days. Therefore, I humbly request you to grant me leave of absence for a period of 3 days from 6 March to 11 March 2018, which if you do, I shall remain highly obliged. The doctor's certificate is attached herewith. Thanking you, (Your Name) Class X Roll Number: 10. Hope this helps.
I am very glad you are with now for these 5 days and you're very special to me your very glad you to my teacher.
